net.trajano.ms.core

Class ErrorResponse

  • java.lang.Object
    • net.trajano.ms.core.ErrorResponse

  • public class ErrorResponse
extends Object
    Error response. This is the error response that gets built by the system for any errors that occur.
    Author:
    Archimedes Trajano

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      private static class  ErrorResponse.LocalStackTraceElement
      Local stack trace element.

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description

      Host of the server that threw the error.

      JWT ID.

      The request ID.

      Request URI.

      The stack trace.
      private String threadId
      The thread ID.

    • Field Detail

      • cause

        private final ErrorResponse cause
        The cause of this ErrorResponse or null if the cause is nonexistent or unknown.

      • error

        private final String error
        The error code. This follows OAuth 2.0 error responses.

      • errorClass

        private final String errorClass
        Class name of the error.

      • errorDescription

        private final String errorDescription
        The error description. This follows OAuth 2.0 error responses.

      • host

        private final String host
        Host of the server that threw the error. This shows the hostname and port.

      • jwtId

        private final String jwtId
        JWT ID. This represents the session.

      • requestId

        private final String requestId
        The request ID. This is obtained from the header.

      • requestUri

        private final URI requestUri
        Request URI.

      • stackTrace

        private final List<ErrorResponse.LocalStackTraceElement> stackTrace
        The stack trace.

      • threadId

        private final String threadId
        The thread ID.

    • Constructor Detail

      • ErrorResponse

        protected ErrorResponse()
        Constructs an empty ErrorResponse. This is used for cause to prevent repeating the same information.

      • ErrorResponse

        public ErrorResponse(String error,
                     String errorDescription)
        Creates an error response with just the error code and description. The request ID will be taken from the MDC.
        Parameters:
        error - error code
        errorDescription - error description

      • ErrorResponse

        @Deprecated
public ErrorResponse(String error,
                                 String errorDescription,
                                 String requestId)
        Deprecated. the requestId value is ignored and is taken from the MDC.
        Creates an error response with just the error code and description. The request ID will be taken from the MDC.
        Parameters:
        error - error code
        errorDescription - error description
        requestId - ignored

      • ErrorResponse

        protected ErrorResponse(Throwable e)
        Constructs ErrorResponse to chain the cause.
        Parameters:
        e - cause

      • ErrorResponse

        @Deprecated
public ErrorResponse(Throwable e,
                                 javax.ws.rs.core.HttpHeaders headers,
                                 javax.ws.rs.core.UriInfo uriInfo,
                                 boolean showStackTrace,
                                 boolean showRequestUri)
        Deprecated. use ErrorResponse(Throwable, UriInfo, boolean)
        Wraps a Throwable in an ErrorResponse with full stack trace and cause if requested.
        Parameters:
        e - exception to wrap
        headers - ignored
        uriInfo - URI info
        showStackTrace - flag to determine whether the stack trace is to be shown.
        showRequestUri - ignored

      • ErrorResponse

        public ErrorResponse(Throwable e,
                     javax.ws.rs.core.UriInfo uriInfo,
                     boolean showStackTrace)
        Wraps a Throwable in an ErrorResponse with full stack trace and cause if requested.
        Parameters:
        e - exception to wrap
        uriInfo - URI info
        showStackTrace - flag to determine whether the stack trace is to be shown.

      • isFiltered

        private boolean isFiltered(StackTraceElement ste)

        Checks if it is an internal call so the stack trace does not get too long. Internal classes such as "sun.*" are filtered.

        Parameters:
        ste - stack trace element
        Returns:
        true if it is an internal class.
